overview: Honey, we have a guest! Young Amirah has just arrived and Anissa and Rick get excited thinking about what they could do with her. Will she join them for a threesome? Also in this movie: Ania and Carmen start a foursome, Anissa and Jasmine go on a hardcore vacation and Cassie has her hands full with 2 guys. Enjoy!
title: Couples Banging a Friend
